page.title: 01LIFE IN OUR BLOCK.
page.content: The area around Buckingham is mainly rural,and is considered by most pupils to be quite a pleasant place to live. The town itself is mainly residential, although it lacks any large department stores,and most people shop elsewhere for anything but food. Few people work in Buckingham,but have to use their own transport to get to work,since public transport is poor. There are good facilities for recreation,such as the swimming pool and sports fields. There are also activities such as plays,school fetes and the occasional circus and fair,so people who live in villages consider Buckingham to be quite busy. Recently,quite a large number of students from overseas have come to study at Buckingham University,the only private University in the country.
